pr_title: Add error message if Xcode 12 is used

timeline.message: Add error message if Xcode 12 is used

timeline.bodyText: 11+ also includes version 12. I would remove the + suffixes in the message.
timeline.author: tiainen

replies.bodyText: Where does 12+ relate to 11? I'll remove it anyway
replies.author: jperedadnr

replies.bodyText: I was in fact referring to the 11+ in the next line. So having 12+ indeed makes a bit of sense, but let us hope we can remove this code before xcode 13.
replies.author: tiainen
